title: Alternative Health
description: If you're open to trying something other than standard medicine, explore natural remedies with wikiHow's Alternative Health category. Our helpful articles will give you advice on taking supplements, like licorice root, and show you how to naturally treat physical and mental health conditions like hyperthyroidism and anxiety. Learn about finding a naturopathic doctor, doing a vitamin C flush, and much more.
cleaned_text: Alternative Health If you're open to trying something other than standard medicine, [explore natural remedies](/Use-Natural-Remedies) with wikiHow's Alternative Health category. Our helpful articles will give you advice on taking supplements, like [licorice root](/Take-Licorice-Root), and show you how to naturally treat physical and mental health conditions like [hyperthyroidism](/Control-Hyperthyroidism-Naturally) and [anxiety](/Beat-Anxiety-Naturally). Learn about [finding a naturopathic doctor](/Find-a-Naturopathic-Doctor), [doing a vitamin C flush](/Do-a-Vitamin-C-Flush), and much more.
